content:
Low Carb High Protein Breakfast Meal Plan:

1. Egg and Vegetable Scramble: Whisk together 2 eggs, diced vegetables (such as bell peppers, mushrooms, and spinach), and a sprinkle of shredded cheese. Cook in a non-stick pan over medium heat until the eggs are set.
2. Greek Yogurt with Berries and Nuts: Mix together 6 oz of Greek yogurt, 1/2 cup of mixed berries, and 1 tablespoon of chopped nuts (such as almonds or walnuts).
3. Cottage Cheese and Vegetable Omelette: Whisk together 2 eggs and 1/4 cup of cottage cheese. Add diced vegetables (such as bell peppers, mushrooms, and spinach) to the mixture and cook in a non-stick pan over medium heat until the eggs are set.
4. Cream Cheese and Lox Bagel: Spread 2 tablespoons of cream cheese over a toasted low-carb bagel. Top with 2 ounces of smoked salmon (lox) and thinly sliced red onion.
5. Breakfast Meat and Cheese Roll-Ups: Roll 2 slices of deli meat (such as turkey or ham) and 1 slice of cheese around steamed asparagus or spinach.
6. Peanut Butter and Celery Sticks: Spread 2 tablespoons of natural peanut butter over celery sticks, add some chopped nuts or chia seeds on top.

You can always customize the above breakfast meal plan with your own preferences, such as using different types of cheese, meat or vegetables.
